subject: Automobile Racing
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
Social Networking (Internet)
Daytona 500 (Auto Race)
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Nascar has turned to research in an effort to regain its following, and the racing circuit has planned a fresh approach on several fronts, including social media.
snippet: Nascar has turned to research in an effort to regain its following, and the racing circuit has planned a fresh approach on several fronts, including social media.
